name: XRSession.requestReferenceSpace
description: The requestReferenceSpace() method of the XRSession interface returns a promise that resolves with an instance of either XRReferenceSpace or XRBoundedReferenceSpace as appropriate given the type of reference space requested.
content:
Draft
This page is not complete.

Secure context
This feature is available only in secure contexts (HTTPS), in some or all supporting browsers.

The requestReferenceSpace() method of the XRSession interface returns a promise that resolves with an instance of either XRReferenceSpace orXRBoundedReferenceSpaceas appropriate given the type of reference space requested.
